title: Film Theory: The Bomb in Oppenheimer Isn’t What You Think…
description:
*SUBSCRIBE to Film Theory!*
Don't miss a Film Theory! ► https://www.youtube.com/@FilmTheory/?sub_confirmation=1

Barbenheimer was fun; however today we’re not focusing on The Barbie Movie but Oppenheimer. You see, Loyal Theorist, there is a secret hidden in the Oppenheimer that NOBODY realized… Oppenheimer is secretly about Batman?! Yes! Let us explain.
